Posting Policy

By using this platform, you acknowledge and agree to the following posting policy:

Defentions:
  • Posting: Any content you share on this platform, including but not limited to text, images, and links.
  • Platform: The website or application where you are posting content.
  • Content: Any material you create or share on the platform.
  • You: the partie(s) and/or people involed in creating/writing the Content
  • I/Me: the owner of the platform and such assets
  • Tankshark:

  • I reserve the right to take down, edit, manage, and moderate any postings at my sole discretion, without any restrictions and without prior notice.
  • No persistent data is stored. Any content you post will not be retained permanently.
  • You will not post about and/or relating to the following:
    • Illegal activities
    • Hate speech
    • Harassment or bullying
    • Spam or irrelevant content
    • Personal information of others or yourself
    • Other games
  • Additionaly:

    • THE PRODUCT IS DELIVERED "AS IS."
